data.title: Eensymachines
data.short_desc: We are a tech-startup based in Pune, India. We build Internet-Of-Things artefacts that can make your home an interesting place to live at. All the products are cloud-ready and can be controlled from anyplace that has internet.

desc.p: Eensymachines was conceptualized in March of 2018 and it took shape 2021 and started its first sale in 2022. Begetter was a home-automation enthusiast who built several gadgets for his own home eventually launched it on the market shelf, after having tested it in the field.

Eensymachines focuses on getting IoT to common households, making living a fun experience. For long we have got ourseleves busy with menial jobs that could have been delegated to a swarm of tiny machines (eensy machines) which know our preferences well.
Eensymachines assembles hardware, writes/builds its software on the devices and cloud. Optimized accurate code, reliable hardware build are some of the hallmarks of it.
